education.title: University of the Arts London
education.field: Filmmaking with a specialisation in screenwriting
education.description: Spent 3 years studying elements of filmmaking, the business of filmmaking and worked in various roles (writer, directer, producer, documentary-maker, cinematographer) across filmmaking projects.
